captions.text:
WE'RE GONNA PLAY A GAME,
AND IT'S CALLED "NEVER HAVE I,"

I'M GONNA ASK
A SERIES OF QUESTIONS

LIKE "NEVER HAVE I
LIED TO MY BOSS,"

AND YOU HAVE TO JUST HOLD THAT
UP, "I HAVE; NEVER HAVE I."

STOLEN SOMETHING
FROM MY DRESSING ROOM.

- HAVE YOU EVER STOLEN ANYTHING
FROM MY--

NEVER EVER HAVE I
HAD A ONE-NIGHT STAND.

- NEVER EVER HAVE I
USED SOMEONE ELSE'S TOOTHBRUSH.

NEVER EVER HAVE I
SAID A BABY WAS CUTE

NEVER EVER HAVE I
BEEN TO A NUDE BEACH.

- NEVER EVER HAVE I
SEEN A GHOST.

- OKAY, WHAT IF
YOU'VE SENSED A PRESENCE?

- YEAH,
THAT'S WHY I DID IT HALFWAY.

YOU KNOW, THAT'S THE POINT.
- GHOST OF CHRISTMAS PAST.

- YOU DON'T KNOW,
BUT YOU THINK YOU'VE SEEN--

- YOU HAVE SEEN?
- YOU HAVE? YOU DEFINITELY HAVE?

- AND I'VE SEEN ONE, YES.
- YOU HAVE SEEN ONE.

- I WANT TO HEAR ABOUT
THIS AFTER--

WELL, IF YOU HAVE TO ASK,
THEN YOU--

- NO, I THINK
I KNOW WHAT YOU MEAN.

"THE AMAZING SPIDER-MAN 2"
OPENS IN THEATERS MAY 2ND.

title: 'The Amazing Spider-Man 2' Cast Plays Never Have I Ever
